name: ORS IRC Spends
description:
This report returns the current spends balance held by an Immigration Removal Centre for each detainee.
FIN0052 - v00.00.02 Last Modified: 23/04/12

dataset.name: IRC Spend
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)) AS UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_ACCOUNT_CODES.ACCOUNT_CODE) = 2102 THEN AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS.BALANCE ELSE 0 END) AS SUM_OF_SPEND_ACCOUNT_BALANCE FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS, OMS_OWNER.ACCOUNT_CODES AT_ACCOUNT_CODES, CASELOADS AT_CASELOADS_BALANCES, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS AT_USER_ACCOUNT_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS.OFFENDER_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ROOT_OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_ACCOUNT_CODES.ACCOUNT_CODE = AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS.TRUST_ACCOUNT_CODE) AND (AT_USER_ACCOUNT_CASELOADS.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS.CASELOAD_ID = AT_USER_ACCOUNT_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOADS_BALANCES.CASELOAD_ID = AT_USER_ACCOUNT_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IN_OUT_STATUS = 'IN' AND AT_OFFENDER_SUB_ACCOUNTS.TRUST_ACCOUNT_CODE = 2102 AND AT_CASELOADS_BALANCES.CASELOAD_ID = (SELECT CASELOAD_ID FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Immigration Removal Centre Caseload Id','A','Accounts\IRC Caseload Id',Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID = (SELECT CASELOAD_ID FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Immigration Removal Centre Caseload Id','A','Offender\Offender Booking Agy Loc Id',Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */)) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT, SUM_OF_SPEND_ACCOUNT_BALANCE FROM dataset_base_)

parameters.name: caseload_id
parameters.description: @prompt('Immigration Removal Centre Caseload Id','A','Accounts\IRC Caseload Id',Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0)
